HomePage.title: Adrià Martín Martorell
HomePage.subtitle: Technical Founder & Architect Developer
HomePage.description: Entrepreneur and multidisciplinary programmer focused on solving infrastructure problems and complex management environments

ResponsiveWeb.errorResponsiveSizeMessage: This is a serious web portfolio, it cannot be accessed by mobile or tablet. Please use a computer to view it.

Hobbies.1rParagraph: I started at the age of 11 to understand programming by copying video games in Godot. Then, at 13, I seriously dedicated myself to studying computer programming — not as a hobby but as a profession — spending time during school breaks when I was in high school.
Hobbies.2rParagraph: At 16, I began working with React and its libraries, learning CSR on the web, along with how to develop enterprise software, including the use of APIs, message queues, DevOps, cross-platform mobile apps, and more.
Hobbies.3rParagraph: And starting at 18, with the experience of having worked on library creation and a massive enterprise software project for hair salons, I decided to
Hobbies.3rParagraphHighlighted: start my own venture, creating a business suite for the hospitality industry.
